name: Dina dummie!
greetingText: Look how far we've come! It has been 8+ months.
wishText: I know u liked it didnt ya ???? But guess what! Its not over yet! Wait for it!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Many many happy returns, may u never die and find a long haired man with cats.... blah...blah....
text2: Well it would be lame if i did that being your closest friend.
text4: So, being a programmer i had to do something
text5Content: Well, obviously because you're special and my best friend
outroText: I WROTE IT MYSELF SO DO READ
replayText: Ya, ya, it Ghasted your flabber! I know! Now u can come back and text me if you've read the poem already!
